name: Joined at the Ship
description:
Made for GMTK game jam 2021.

Join a range of different weapons to your ship, and use your momentum to swing them into the enemies on the screen!

Weapon Types:
Normal ball
Heavy
Pinwheel
Gun

White enemies do 1 damage to health (half a heart)
Gold enemies do 2 damage to health (full heart)

WASD to move
Left click to Fire/Spin (when applicable)

Available in browser, or on Windows machines!
Windows build has some extra capabilities not present in the browser version, check it out if you can!

Programming, Design, Art:
Conor McKenna

Music:
Jeremy Blake - Powerup!

This entry was a solo effort by Conor McKenna.
http://cyberthreatgame.com
https://twitter.com/cyberthreatgame
